activities:
Although our website is not directed or targeted to EU residents, we recognize that EU residents might submit personal information on one or more of our sites. We don't exclude anyone -- including non-U.S. residents -- from doing so. Our answers below pertain to all individuals, not just EU residents. 
•	We use the personal information of those who register on our sites to contact them when necessary -- if there is a problem with their membership or online order, to respond to feedback or complaints, notify if there is a data breach, or if a member requests to be contacted in relation to any of GetLegal's services.  
•	We may use the personal information of those who register on our sites to send them newsletters and information. 
•	We may also collect demographic and contact information  (such as mailing address)  from  our online surveys and contests and use it to send users promotional materials from our business partners,  as well as from GetLegal.com sites.  
•	We provide public forums for our registered users and encourage them to use caution when disclosing any additional personal information on our public sites.  
•	We do not send unsolicited or spam email to anyone.  
•	We use email addresses to send email alerts and newsletters containing new information, special offers and new products to our members and customers.
